page.title: 13DIET, 1 DAY,GIRL AGE 9.
page.content: {SATURDAY, BREAKFAST, 0716. { }Toasted white bread,30g.Marmite (yeast extract),7g. Cup of tea, with sugar and milk,203g. Orange juice,45g. {LUNCH, 1200. 2 slices white bread,30g. 2 slices ham,60g. one thick chocolate biscuit, 15g. 1 carbonated drink,45g. { SNACK,1550.} 2 biscuits,30g. 1 carbonated drink 45g. { SNACK,1605. 1 biscuit,15g. { TEA,1655.} Soup,240g. cake,45g. 1 slice white bread,30g. { DINNER,1900. { }Shepherds' Pie (minced meat covered with potatoes) 170g. Mixed vegetables, 120g. Glass of water,0g. ( This child is of an upper middle class professional family )
